He is a member of  the Institute for Computing, Information, and Cognitive Systems and is a Faculty Fellow at St. John’s College. Dr. Gopalakrishnan obtained a PhD in computer science and received his MS in applied mathematics from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Dr. Gopalakrishnan is also the Chapter Chair for the Vancouver Chapter of the IEEE Computer Society and is a member of the Executive Committee for the IEEE Technical Committee on Real-Time Systems. Research Interests Real-time systems, distributed systems, resource management.
